description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Get ready for the ultimate co-op adventure!!! In OSD you will battle through rich 3D environments destroying everything old school style!. New technology meets the classic destroy first, ask questions later gameplay to give you the HD experience of a lifetime.  Beautiful graphics employing advanced techniques like soft shadows and real time lightning deliver crisp visuals through the whole game!
description.short: Get ready for the ultimate co-op adventure!!! In OSD you will battle through rich 3D environments destroying everything old school style!. New technology meets the classic destroy first, ask questions later gameplay to give you the HD experience of a lifetime.  Beautiful graphics employing advanced techniques like soft shadows and real time lightning deliver crisp visuals through the whole game!
